Effect: Choose one of the following benefits:

  • Arcane Improvisation: @Embed[Compendium.draw-steel.rewards.Item.6aUdSBlcu3BRZzjd inline]

  • I Have Just the Book: @Embed[Compendium.draw-steel.rewards.Item.GhwLVYx6bcmT8AZB inline]

system.story: You want to know the exact coordinates of the Gem of the Waves shipwreck? I came across that just the other day in an unpublished memoir of its second mate. Let me get that for you.

prerequisites.value: You have the Ancient Loremaster title, and you have completed a Discover Lore project to learn lost knowledge or forbidden knowledge.
